They are deep fried as well.Their service is fast!

14.description: Chicago style is really good. Best shrimp in the city!!!!

3.description: I believe my mom said they changed ownership in June. We decided to order for delivery from them.Egg Rolls & Crab Rangoons - Okay, but had betterCombo Fried Rice - Nothing specialBeef Chow Funn - This was okay, but very little noodles and they made it more Americanized by putting cabbage and other veggies in it.Orange Chicken - OkayNothing really stood out. Rather go elsewhere.

1.description: I really liked this place, their food is good but the cashier they got now is a total disrespectful ass bitch! You guys always deliver to me and now you guys say you can't and hang up on me!Wtf is wrong with you guys, you mothafuckers got no respect!

0.description: came here because i wanted Chinese food that comes with fried rice instead of the traditional white rice lol..  from the outside, this restaurant looks kind of ghetto with the sign looking kind of faded.. the inside looks very simple and have plenty of tables and seats to dine in.. the service is great and the people is nice there! i ordered the Mongolian beef dinner special which is a little over 6 bucks after tax.. in the special it includes a egg roll, a can pop, and a square foam box of half Mongolian beef and half chicken fried rice! they pack that box with food i tell you! the portion is big enough for 2 people or you can make it into 2 meals! the food was really good and the flavor is well balanced! they have a big menu with a lot of great food from Chinese to Thai dishes to choose from and it can get pretty hard if you are a indecisive person like me haha...if you want good food in a big portion for a very low price then this is the spot! i cant wait to come back here to try out other dishes!

2.description: Egg roll ok, fortune cookie good, fried rice, Lo mein noodles, not very good. Kung pao and orange chicken were poor.

5.description: Awesome Chinese food for great price. This place has changed owners a few times over the past few years and for a while it wasn't too great. In the past 2 years or so the quality of the food has definitely improved. The lunch specials are easily enough for 2 people(or enough to save for later)  and are all about $7 and under. The General Chicken is my favorite. The people are very friendly and delivery is always super fast! I would definitely order take out as I'm not sure dining in is still an option.

6.description: Got the Thursday chicken lo mein lunch special.  Large portion and home made quality.

7.description: I really wish I could give this place a better review but the food was terrible.  I ordered some food today for delivery since I was iching for some Chinese food.  The crab rangoon was really oily and tasted old.  As for my main course of pad thai, wow horrible! The noodles were still hard, I just ate some of the meat and threw out the rest, honestly there was probably 75% of it I did not eat.  The only thing that was average was the egg roll but even that was not stellar.  I will not be ordering from here again, sorry the first impression is always the most important and I can't see myself ordering here again.

8.description: OK lemme give you a run down on why this place is awesome for carry out and delivery.. they're QUICK!! and quick in a good way meaning everything is tasting as good as it should. Its hot. Nothing is forgotten. And they're friendly too! You can call ahead, pick up or call for home delivery. TRY the combination fried rice as its not overcooked or full of soy sauce so it may not be as dark as others.. any dishes containing veggies you will see Vibrant fresh veg colors. Broccoli that's Green not grey. The spicy Thai chicken wings are my new favorites to get along with the usually faves of egg Foo young or general tsao chicken. And check it out.. a SOUTH SIDE place that actually makes Thai food along with traditional Cantonese/Mongolian Awesome!! Pad Thai on the south side?? Absurd! But this place has it and does it right. And lets not forget the reasonable pricing... OK gonna order now..

9.description: Relatively inexpensive and really good. The portions are huge and I've noticed that 50% of my orders arrive with a beverage I didn't even pay for, so that's ice.

10.description: I ordered from here and was very satisfied with the food. Delivery was quick, shorter that expected.  Would like to try more of the menu next time.

4.description: My sweet and sour sauce was separate from the chicken but came in a folded paper container. Spilled/leaked frequently in a short trip home. Otherwise food was good.

12.description: This is the best McDonalds in Illinois. I eat at McDonalds five times a week or more, but this is the only McDonalds that has consistent great service and properly prepared food. It should be a model of how McDonalds should be ran.

7.description: I am not one to really dawdle on McDonalds experiences, but I have to. They did recently remodel the place, and I can appreciate that. The service though is more what I am going to review. Every time I go there, I get great service and always with a smile. The guys and girls are really friendly and polite. Manners to me means a whole lot and will decide sometimes if I come back to an establishment. I for one do like the fact that they will recommend something if your "not sure" and that really doesn't happen in fast food. The girls more so are super friendly at the drive thru with their smiles and "good morning how are you sir" shpleel. Awesome manners is what I am reviewing on, cause McDonalds, hmmmmm, doesn't do much for me.

3.description: Ugh. I have tried and tried to give this McD's a chance, but they keep getting my orders wrong. Yesterday, I asked for no mustard on a cheeseburger, and what do I get when I open up the wrapping? No cheese. What??Also this McD's McCafe is not up to the same quality ad other locations. I love to treat my wife to a caramel frappe but this location always makes the drink runny, doesn't fill the cup to the top, and it tastes watered down.They may have renovated to make the place up to date and added a kids play area, but that doesn't make up for the poor service and quality control.

1.description: I feel bad slamming this McDonalds, but that's what I feel compelled to do.  They have a dual drive thru, and yet it routinely takes me 10 minutes to get a single cup of coffee.  I don't understand why it's so slow --no matter what time of day--  but it is.  The location is convenient because of my commute, but I dread pulling into the lot, everytime, knowing that I'll be sitting .  I give the wokers credit.  They must know how long it's taking, because often they hand me my coffee at the first window when I pay, knowing I've been waiting 5 minutes just to hand them my credit card. Maybe it's because of turnover, maybe it's just the time of day, but I know I've been to plenty of other McDonalds that have had their stuff together.

2.description: I just can't understand why it takes 20 minutes in the drive through at any time of day. Even one am. Makes no sense.

9.description: I am not one for promoting this type of franchise; however, I was really impressed with the service at this location.I needed to stop and pick up some breakfast on the way to visiting my mom and this was the only place that had a drive-thru located on the south end of Archer Avenue.  I kept thinking to myself that I should've made something at my house and heated it up when I got to the city.  I got onto Archer Avenue on Harlem, thinking that there would be something with a drive thru by the time I got to my destination.  It wasn't until I passed California I saw McDonald's.  I wasn't happy about stopping, but it was my only choice.  I ordered two bagel/coffee meals.  1. I've NEVER had McDonald's coffee before.  This location brewed it very nice.  It was quite good.  2. I normally don't eat breakfast from a fast food place, but their egg and bacon bagel sandwich was delish!3. The young woman taking my order and the young man handing me my order were so polite and happy.  How exciting it is for me to have found a place on the south end side of Archer Avenue with a drive thru!  My life has become so much easier.

18.description: one time i ate here, and i got fat.

10.description: they always get my order wrong!!! and this spot always makes me wait super long on drive thru. If i dont look in my bag when i get my order i will get mad later because they always get either the order wrong, or forget to give me something. Do not get me started on the staff, SUPER UNPROFFESSIONAL, and thats me not saying something else...

13.description: Just came back from McDonalds & it wasn't goodVery stingy with the fries (which were stale, cold, & unsalted)This new cheese on the sandwiches taste horrible and unpleasantLike i said before, the food was cold (maybe laying there since noon)The service is mediocre, so don't be surprised to be waiting 20 min for your order

16.description: Completely new building. I'll miss the old playland, but the new facilty is larger and cleaner.Same McD food. Has McCafe as well., but there's also flat screens and lots of different seating areas, inclluding a large area foir families(enclosed in the playland).The two drivethru windos seem pointless, but no loss of parking. TRoo bad the walkup isnt open 24/7(drive thru is)

17.description: This place is so different than it used to be.  Neither good nor bad, just different.  The folks working here really do try - I give them credit for that.  The main beef I have with this McDonalds is that they don't seem to have the dual drive-thru orders down pat, making rush time quite confusing.

15.description: 5 Star for the Service, fast and efficient.  4 Star for the food since I grow fat after eatting here.

0.description: Went here before through the drive thru and had no issues. It was lunch time so it was crowded. I went there today and was the only one in line at 11am. I got a meal and then switched out the pop for a caramel frappe. I pull up to the first window and pay, no issues. Pull up to second window and get my food, no problem. But the drink was an issue.At this time there was another customer so the asked me to pull up and wait. 5 minutes later and I still didn't have the frappe. Since no one was there, I went in reverse to the second window and cancelled the frappe and just got a pop. I saw they were making it in the background. I just didn't crave it anymore at this point. They partially refunded me for the up charge too. It will be a while before I go back.

5.description: Funny store, my girlfriend wants to have chicken nugget like 3:30 in the morning. So I drove all the way from south Chinatown to this closest McDonald to finish my mission. So they told me they were closing and could  not sell me any chicken nuggets, and basket fast will be serve 1 hour 30 mins later.I will very disappointed, then my friend put out a stupid idea. "Tip her $20 bucks see if she would sell u that "............ I finished my mission. Money makes things happen!!!!! Evan a close McDonald sold me food and also free fires and drinks lol

11.description: IF YOUR LACTOSE INTOLERANT THIS MCDONALD'S WILL GET YOU SICK!!!I do not like going to this McDonald's would much rather drive to the one on 42nd and Ashland. Every time I am at this McDonald's on Archer they screw up my order. I mean how hard is no cheese?  I would have been forgiving about it, Had I not had to send the same sandwich back 3 times in that one trip because they kept sending it with cheese and arguing with the cashier about it, It is a sad excuse for a McDonald's. Service here is not so great. Waited 3 months went back had to go back up and re-get my food because once again there was cheese when I said no cheese.

8.description: Very slow and bad service. They take forever to get your order, the staff is not very nice and the parking sucks!! Also if you do not like High School or Middle School kids do not step foot in this place!!

4.description: This McDonald's is like 3 blocks from my house.  And i have to say is the worst McDonald's i been to. It's 12:30am right now. It took 15minutes in the drive thru.  I thought it was a fast food place. And not only that I wait so long just to get my order wrong . Definitely needs better management or new staff.

14.description: Crappy service, rude employees, get orders wrong all the time, only accepts cash at night which is stupid, HATED IT.

6.description: Decent. Play area was clean. Cashiers are nice.Drive thru can be quite long sometimes though.

0.description: OMAR Distributors is a wholesale supplier for many of the "dollar stores" in the Chicagoland area. They have a big warehouse on 47th Street, and they also have this Discount Center, which is a retail location. Seeing the enticing signs on the exterior of the building, went in there out of curiosity to see what Mr. Omar has in his bazaar. It's really big, and has two levels, you can go upstairs and see another floor full of different items. Most of the things on the first floor are the same as what they would distribute to their "dollar stores", and therefore many things cost $1. But they also have a variety of higher-end end items. The upstairs has bedding, clothing, shoes, house wares, luggage, and a whole showroom floor of furniture. The place is well-organized, and the guys working there were polite and even said "hello" when I came in. If you look carefully among all of the miscellaneous things on the shelves, there are indeed some items that are: - useful - acceptable quality - very good priceHowever, most of it is no different that what you can get in your local dollar store, and the prices of the higher-end items that they do have are unremarkable. Nothing wrong with the place, but I couldn't feel excited about it, either, and didn't end up buying anything. Maybe a fun place to browse for bargains if you are already in that area, but not as fun as I had hoped, and no real reason to go out of your way to see it.

3.description: The burgers here are great. The avocado burger just really blew me away. They specialize in burgers and it really shows when you taste the finished product. The owner and staff are very kind and provide excellent service. Stop in if your in the area

1.description: First of I was super iffy about this spot since it's so hidden. Luckily is a hidden gem. My cousin recommend it but still iffy about it. I live 3 min drive away from this location. I got a great free parking spot right in front. The  service was quick and friendly. Free soup while waiting.... The burgers are fresh and made to order. I got a burger with bacon for 4.50$$$ that's a great price most place charge extra for bacon or overcharge for the bacon burger, anyways .. Including fries. Got a order of tenders for myself and fiancé they were good and came with fries. I would def come back to this location not only for being so close to my house but for the great food and service. I most definitely recommend it!!

2.description: The location of this restaurant had me questioning whether I even wanted to give it a try. But my uncle and cousin kept raving about the burgers and said we wouldn't regret it....so we gave it a try. I AM SOOO GLAD WE DID!! Best burger ever! First, all burgers are 1/2 lbs. of meat. It is cooked to perfection still a little pink on the inside and juicy and flavorful. Next you have a couple of options to choose from: Bacon, Avocado, Jalapeno, Mushroom, Ham, or The Salon (which includes all of the mentioned options). Cheese is an extra ingredient and it comes with like a pound of potatoes. Price...under $5. You also get free soup while you wait for your order. The restaurant is small but very clean, and the staff is very friendly. It is a family business, the Chef is also the owner and he clearly has had culinary training, his Sous Chef is his wife and the waiter/cashier are their sons. Don't be put off by the location, the food is worth it and you won't regret giving it a try.

0.description: This very hidden joint is a tremendous surprise when it comes to quality and value. It's on 38th PLACE, a block west of Kedzie Ave. The owner/chef seems to have high end restaurant experience based on the preparation of his dishes. What I can't get over is the amazing value on his burgers! I had the $6 Salon Buger that includes about three potatoes worth of fries. It has ham, jalapeño, bacon, onions and a half pound buger! It is fantastic. My son was in the mood for breakfast, so we order a bacon and egg sandwich, which had three potatoes worth of hash browns. The sandwich was a three egg omelet with 4 bacon slice on toasted white bread. The fluffy egg and meaty bacon were fantastic. Along with my wife's Bacon Burger and along with huge chicken tenders and drinks, we spent about $25. You cannot miss this place! It may not be the most welcoming neighborhood,  but Salon is a welcomed surprise!

4.description: This place has really great tasting burgers for a great value. You will get a more fulfilling, inexpensive, and satisfying meal here than a McDonald's. The burgers taste fresh, the buns are extra soft and they come with a mountain of French fries. A bacon cheeseburger with fries is about $5.50, seriously you cannot get a better deal.

1.description: This is a good place to get a cold beer and meet some nice people. They have a pool table, dart board , ATM, and you can get your lottery tickets. It is family owned for over 25 years. Good place to watch games they big HD tv's.

0.description: Great place.  Everyone is always really nice there. The bartenders rock! Prices are nothing to complain about. And the bar dog is awesome!

3.description: Mexican club with great dj mix at least some nights that i walk by - but super ghetto - Pretty small. Not too bad I guess - depends on what you want and need.

1.description: this place could close down tomorrow and i would dance on the bricks. I went here on ladies night. Im a lady. As soon as I walked in with my friends everyone was starring. I came with my male friends and they got frisked. This place is ghetto. The clientele not so much but the staff ghetto hood rats. I went to the bartender asked how much would it be if i ordered 4 jack and cokes. He said a dollar for you and 8 for the rest. I said ok give me one jack and coke. He charged me 8 bucks. This place lost out on business. I love to go out and this place is close to me. Never going here again they can suck it. ps. Im writing this while sippin on a jack and coke

2.description: Nice place to go catch a game or to get ya dance on depending on what night you go. Thursdays are always poppin and the music is good.

0.description: This place looks kind of bad from the outside, but once you go in it isn't so bad. I only been here a few times.. Thursday nights is ladies nights... dollar drinks :) lol Great DJ ... love the music (on the first floor anyway) Place is kinda ghetto, but I had a lot of fun... The second floor though... needs a ventilation system.. it was musty and hot up there.. and they were suppose to be playing Mexican music (from what the bartender told me) -- but I think they assumed just because it was Spanish music it equals Mexican..I'd go back..

4.description: this place is SUPER GHETTO! the music is pretty good though and so r the drinks go on thurseday when drinks r only a $1 but i'm really not lying when i say this place is sosososososo GHETTO!!!!!!!!!!

0.description: Guapo tacotacos de canasta!!!A few days ago looking for a place to eat some tacos came into this place, I knew they had tacos de canasta but wasn't sure what to expect.Came in with a friend and we had a mix of tacos, all from refried beans, chicharron prensado, potatoes, pierna de puerco, all of them were good, some more than other, I guess that will be on personal preference. They have some sides to go with your tacos, make sure to ask about them. The tacos come out on a nice rustic tray along with the salsas and sides. (see picture)The place is small with a couple of wooden benches to eat. The service is super nice, they asked if we had been there before, and since we hadn't, they explained the concept, menu and even made some recommendations.Good tacos de canasta, great customer service, Will definitely go back

1.description: What was I thinking?

0.description: For the price you can't beat it! They really stepped up the service on this location! I went in and there was a lot of people there but I got attended right away. 5 dollar pizza is okay in my books. Will for sure come back to this location when I'm on the go and hungry! Good job you guys!

58.description: The chips and salsa are amazing best in town. Had the three steak taco dinner very good.waitress was friendly and attentive. The price is right for such good food will have to try it again.

56.description: always order enpanada. the best enpanada ever.their marinated vegetable is also the best free side. this is a good one. affordable!

29.description: Went here for a birthday brunch with the family.  While everyone was enjoying the food (which is very good), it turns out my 2 year old nephew had a deep fried dead roach on his plate.  Once everyone found out about it, no one could eat another bite.  So horrible!  This was a group of 20 & the owner apologized & comped us the entire meal.  We left & ordered a pizza.  ugh!  Such a shame.  The food was very good.  I just can't see myself going there & taking the risk again.

42.description: I'm a huge fan but this place is kind of slipping...the new menu removed many if our favorites and the quality of anything with meat is much lower than before. I hope they can get back to where they were before. It's been a favorite for so long.

23.description: Food is decent and comes out fast. I enjoyed the steak enchiladas with Verde sauce. The steak torta was also very good. I loved their lemonade with Pepino.  Refreshing. I would return for a quick bite.

47.description: Very upscale yet small girl. It was decorated nicely. The service was friendly. The food was very good with great spices and flavors. You could tell the chef cared about what he was cooking.

8.description: The wait for food is long but it's totally worth it. The cost is less and they give you enough to each. I was full before I could even finish my dish.

31.description: I went here yesterday and didn't really enjoy the food. I ordered two chicken tacos and the taste was not the best like it used to be. They chicken tastes kinda boring and its just plain like what I could make at home. If I wanted to have homemade tacos, I would't have come to this place. I won't be coming here anymore. These guys lost a customer.

34.description: One night while going on a Halloween costume run,  mmy sig other suggested we eat here for dinner.  As I am Mexican,  I am always skeptical of a new Mexican place I haven't tried.  So we went in and I ordered the flautas dinner and he ordered the burrito.  It was so good,  I liked everything,  the fried tacos,  the rice,  the beans,  and the really good salsa that was bought to our table.  We were really excited about the meal that we decided to order the flan for dessert which was really good too.  I never knew this place was here and I'll definitely be coming back.  Mmmmm

16.description: One night while going on a Halloween costume run,  mmy sig other suggested we eat here for dinner.  As I am Mexican,  I am always skeptical of a new Mexican place I haven't tried.  So we went in and I ordered the flautas dinner and he ordered the burrito.  It was so good,  I liked everything,  the fried tacos,  the rice,  the beans,  and the really good salsa that was bought to our table.  We were really excited about the meal that we decided to order the flan for dessert which was really good too.  I never knew this place was here and I'll definitely be coming back.  Mmmmm

13.description: Came here with friends not too long ago.  They have a small parking lot right next to the restaurant.  I'd recommend the tongue taco.

11.description: If I could give no stars I would. This place is horrible 1st time I ordered they messed up my order even after repeat it to her multiple times; I decided to give them a second chance & they mess it up yet AGAIN!! Woman on the phone has HORRIBLE customer service skills & claims to be the manager. SMH do yourself a favor & AVOID!

39.description: The food is very good. .Green sauce is actually spicy. .Doesnt hurt the girls are pretty. Always have a good experience eating here.

37.description: Honest review: umm its good not the best not the worst out of all ur cheezy taco places i would put this as the top all the tacos are great the carne en su jugo is amaizn the aqua achata is amaizing best i ever had its no 5 star restaurant but it is good the salsas are good i come back to it alot when i jus want a normal soup n taco meal if u want the best mexican restaurant go to libertad in skokie check out my review to get more info on it

0.description: Steak burrito! [insert heart]It's so good I crave it all the time!

38.description: A friend recomemded this place... Very good tasty Mexican food. Hands down this place is than ones found in the northside. I am sure I will stop by whenever I am in the area.

51.description: I went here on Easter with a buddy of mine. Glad they were open. Bright, clean happy dining environment. The food was fresh and tasty. The salsa was delicious with a sneaky spiciness. It was good. I had a steak and an Al Pastor taco and both were very good. I thought the steak Gordita was especially good. I will be going back again to try a Carne Asada dinner. Oh, its not a long drive from downtown by the way.

27.description: Went there with a party of six. I ordered the carmona de ajo. Horrible to say the least. with a wilted salad, French fries, horrible tasteless rice and what looked like garlic bread, the dish cost me 10.99 for yuck others at the table were not satisfied as well. After the table was cleared we were left there sitting for 15 minutes without any of the order staff to ask us if we needed anything else, a couple of the members of our party wanted to order flan but NO. The automatically added the tip to bill so why serve the table. I will not be going back. When the restaurant first opened the food was decent I used to work at the CTA garage on the corner, I think Tio Luis should have saved his money on the rehab and kept what worked. O well so sad.

32.description: Today (12/11/2014) is the last day I order from Tio Luis.I am putting this in writing so I do not cave in.The food & service is a hit or miss. Lately it has been all misses. I order from here frequently - it is the go to Mexican restaurant in the neighborhood that delivers. Everytime I call it always sounds hectic and noisy. Once I get my order done, the food arrives within 45 minutes, no complaints. I live close by. There is almost always something missing. Salsa, chips, rice...you get it. When you call to tell them they forgot something, they sit silently on the phone. "Ummmm...do you still want us to bring it?" No, just take my money, don't apologize & I will continue to order from you. No apologies.One time they forgot our large salsa - who eats Mexican food without salsa, right? I called and they gave me the above spiel. They said that they would "credit me", so that the next time I ordered I could get a "free" large salsa. When that time came a few weeks later, they acted like I was crazy. After going back and forth, they begrudgingly gave me my (paid for 3 weeks ago) salsa. That was the first time I promised myself I would not order from them. The food quality has declined severely over the past couple of years. One time we received sour salsa - it was nasty! My boyfriend had chicken tacos with the most repulsive sour onions. (I will upload the picture) When ordering for delivery, the food will sometimes come soggy. I have eaten multiple times in the restaurant. It's okay. Nothing spectacular. Do not get the fish tacos. I could not eat them, maybe it was me - they were horrible. The service is also just okay. The waiters are pleasant.It's a shame that this place has declined so much in the past couple of years.Order take out and your own risk - eat there if you really want to give it a good try.

54.description: For the price and the atmosphere, you can't go wrong. The food is fresh and made to order. I tried the lemonade with cucumber. Yes, it sounds different, but very tasty!There is street parking or if you can park on the side of the restaurant.

48.description: Some things were good, some were not as good. Good first:My partner's mole enchiladas were perfect with a generous portion and great tinga meat inside. My chile relleno taco was a little oily but hey it's a chile relleno taco, what are you going to do? It was great.Not as good was the taco de tripas. The waiter asked me if I wanted it "well done" and without thinking I said yes - this meant the meat was fully crispy with no chewiness at all. I wouldn't order it that way again.Also frustrating were long waits first to order (it seems they forgot about us), then for our food, then for the check. They also forgot a salad for me and I had to ask for it to be taken off the bill.

44.description: Horrible experience!!! Didn't live up to the hype. We waited so long to even receive menus, even longer to order the food experience was horrible and I had to chase her down for the check!!!! Let me get into details my friends steak taco was reheated. She and I also ordered a taco de chile relleno it was super greasy . I Ordered a taco de Camaron ( sadest taco I've ever seen) 3 small shrimp. Didn't even fill the taco 1/4 way. I took one bite and just said to take it back because it was overpriced, not good, and close to non existent. The server said that she wasn't going to take the bill off because I ate most of it. No lady!!!! There was just nothing there to eat.She pretty much proceeded to argue with me that seafood is expensive and they gave a fair portion. It was very frustrating because we waited 45 minutes to receive our food even though the place was barely full and we were seated immediately . I left starving, angry, and disappointed.

24.description: Best steak tacos in Chicago. They won that title a few years back and I honestly feel like no one else has tooken it. Zaca tacos is good but if u want tacos de Asada full of flavor then this is your place ..

I order from here frequently - it is the go to Mexican restaurant in the neighborhood that delivers. Everytime I call it always sounds hectic and noisy. Once I get my order done, the food arrives within 45 minutes, no complaints. I live close by. There is almost always something missing. Salsa, chips, rice...you get it. When you call to tell them they forgot something, they sit silently on the phone. "Ummmm...do you still want us to bring it?" No, just take my money, don't apologize & I will continue to order from you. No apologies.One time they forgot our large salsa - who eats Mexican food without salsa, right? I called and they gave me the above spiel. They said that they would "credit me", so that the next time I ordered I could get a "free" large salsa. When that time came a few weeks later, they acted like I was crazy. After going back and forth, they begrudgingly gave me my (paid for 3 weeks ago) salsa. That was the first time I promised myself I would not order from them. The food quality has declined severely over the past couple of years. One time we received sour salsa - it was nasty! My boyfriend had chicken tacos with the most repulsive sour onions. (I will upload the picture) When ordering for delivery, the food will sometimes come soggy. I have eaten multiple times in the restaurant. It's okay. Nothing spectacular. Do not get the fish tacos. I could not eat them, maybe it was me - they were horrible. The service is also just okay. The waiters are pleasant.It's a shame that this place has declined so much in the past couple of years.Order take out and your own risk - eat there if you really want to give it a good try.

49.description: It's been a year since my last update, and i STILL refuse to eat there. Bad customer service, i have heard stories from other friends that also stopped eating there!

40.description: We ate here 9/6/14 at 4:43 pm ,had a late breakfast food came out everything was okay until we found a hair in the food . We informed the server but she said she can;t do anything because the owner was not around.  We did not receive any compensation for the hair in our meal . NEVER GOING BACK AGAIN!!!.

53.description: Tio Luis is one of the only places in the city that serves up my faved Guadalajara style carne en su jugo.  On a recent trip there I was disappointed to have it served cold.  They kindly took it back and sadly microwaved the soup along with the avocados in it.  :(Still giving them three stars and another chance because I will definitely be back for more.

30.description: Great food, great service, and great fruit water drinks. Place is clean and vibrant. The gorditas are tasty and the torta de milanesa is awesome. Reasonable priced.

46.description: This place must be under new management.  Service was terrible.  Food was cold and tasteless.  My mom order fried shrimp.  When she bit into shrimp oil  squirted out from shrimp .  We really tried to eat  our food , but it was impossible.  Called waitress over and showed her how how greasy food was .  I squeezed fries and my hand was full of oil, same thing with shrimp.   Obviously oil was not right temperature for cooking.   I ordered a gordita,   Unbelievable,   a huge scoop of cold beans mixed in with a very small amount of asada, which was also tastless.   We will never return here.

1.description: 3.5 stars solid. The fire roasted salsa is awesome I could eat it with a spoon. Nothing has ever been disappointing except parking in the lot, a little awkward. The tilapia salad is a great light lunch and surprisingly filling. The steak tacos are better then most and the prices across the board are very fair. It is defiantly worth a try you can even keep an eye on the cooks in the kitchen.

55.description: A couple of months ago I would have given this place 4 stars for food and 2 for service, but the quality of the food has really gone downhill. I ate there today and it was not good. The shrimp was small and tough. My son said his steak tacos were all grit. The service has always been bad (unless you get the one male waiter who is actually very good). He is the only person who ever gets my order right and does not double charge for items (check your bill!!!).

9.description: BEST SALSA EVER (seriously). Helpful staff who accommodate our work party of 2-5 at any given time and allow separate checks. Veggie burrito is fantastic. Great food, great staff. Love this place!

26.description: Very good portions and quality tacos. However, I feel like this place is overrated by the hype they received on TV. Just my two cents

25.description: My friends found out about this restaurant from the channel 11 tv show "Check Please" so they wanted to check this place out and asked if I wanted to go. We split and order of queso fundiddo con chorizo. This was very good. We of course got the free chips and salsa. Not too hot. I would have loved it to be a touch more warmer, but it was still good. Our table put a hurt on it. We wanted to get the empanadas, but they were out.  Sad face. You got to get there early if you want them on Sunday or they just run out and don't make anymore. Which is good to know. That means they are fresh. I got a fish taco and a small caldo de pollo soup. I have had better here in Joliet for the soup. It was so much that I have a small bowl of left overs for a lite lunch or snack. We all agreed to come back again and try this place, but we will be early and call to see if they have the empanadas that everyone raves about. They DO NOT make reservations!!!!  The staff was super friendly and the owner was walking around making sure everyone and thing was taken care of and top notch.

12.description: Went here for a birthday brunch with the family.  While everyone was enjoying the food (which is very good), it turns out my 2 year old nephew had a deep fried dead roach on his plate.  Once everyone found out about it, no one could eat another bite.  So horrible!  This was a group of 20 & the owner apologized & comped us the entire meal.  We left & ordered a pizza.  ugh!  Such a shame.  The food was very good.  I just can't see myself going there & taking the risk again.

59.description: One of my all time favorites!! My school is in walking distance to this amazing restaurant!! Everything I authentic and very fresh!! There is not a bad thing in the menu. By far one if the best Mexican joints UN the city!! The staff is awesome as well!!

21.description: Love this place, really good food, have never had their tacos but their enchiladas, guisados even the platanos machos are delicious. I like the fact that you can see through their kitchen, no sweaty overworked cooks, enough staff for heavy times and very very friendly servers! Aguas frescas are too sweet for me, but that's my only negative. Oh and clean bathrooms is always a plus!

17.description: Honest review: umm its good not the best not the worst out of all ur cheezy taco places i would put this as the top all the tacos are great the carne en su jugo is amaizn the aqua achata is amaizing best i ever had its no 5 star restaurant but it is good the salsas are good i come back to it alot when i jus want a normal soup n taco meal if u want the best mexican restaurant go to libertad in skokie check out my review to get more info on it

10.description: I have been coming to this restaurant for a very long time. The salsa is made with care and all their food is authentic

5.description: Absolutely love this place...ordered the chicken soup w corn tortillas and a side of guacomole. Hubby ordered a steak burrito, everything was delish.  Service Ah-mazing!!! Can't wait for our next visit.

3.description: Reasonable food. Good service. Delicious salsa. Not worth the drive`.

19.description: The food is the best in that area, it's just the service that drove me away. But I was recently compensated for the problem that my wife and I had while picking up food here and I have to say, Tio Luis deserves another star!

28.description: Horrible Caldo de pollo! More calabazas than chicken... Rice? Yeah... The size of a spoon ... This is the first and last time I buy a caldo de pollo from there... No worth it!

45.description: The steak is fantastic. That's about the only good thing I can say about my experience. Service was inattentive, but that's not why this review is two stars. We finally got the check and I noticed there was a $20 delivery charge. We were eating in so there was no delivery. Also, how could a delivery charge cost $20? The conclusion I drew was that it was a slow night and the staff was trying to scam us to make up for it. I brought it to our waitress' attention and she all she said was "oh, how'd that get there?" It took her another ten minutes to get a corrected check. We won't be going back.

33.description: Had there steak enchilada's with the red sauce was very very good my fiancé had there steak taco's and she liked them very much too. Only thing this place is missing is margarita's. But the food experience was excellent!

43.description: The waiters are very nice. The food has declined very much. Not sure if they have made changes but one quesadilla for $7 is outrageously expensive. Too much grease used lately. The quality of the chile relleno was not good either. The guacamole was done instantly and taste it like they are now adding done powder or something and just chop avocado on top. Not sure this is the Tio Luis I have known...During my last visit, the only thing that I enjoyed was the Horchata which was excellent.

2.description: Came here after Ash Wednesday service. We had the caldo de camaron (shrimp soup) we also had the enchiladas rojas. Everything was excellent! The chips and salsa they bring out to snack on while the food comes out was also great. The service was excellent also. She was very welcoming and attentive. We were all very pleased with this place.

18.description: Horrible service.  Placed a large order over the phone.  After asking the phone girl to repeat the order and going through it one additional time,(3 times in all) this person managed to mess up my order.  After calling to complain and speaking with the manager  (who was the person who took my order) to see if anything could be done about their mistake, all I got was a response I got was that NEXT time she will listen more closely. Needless to their mix up was NOT CORRECTED. I will take my business somewhere where phone orders are listen to more closely.

41.description: Been here many times and am usually very happy with food/service. My go to dish is the steak taco platter. Today seemed like they may have changed the quality of steak and it was off. Also today my friend ordered the chicken taco dinner and bit into a sliver of metal.  Giving the 3 stars on past reputation.

52.description: Tio Luis is one of those places where you go and just hope to get lucky with the service. The first couple of times my husband and I went we got ok service although the food was pretty good. We had the ceviche as an appetizer and for our entrees we got tacos and a torta. On another occasion we went for breakfast. The coffee was awful, watered down. I asked for toast and the waitress looked at me like I was crazy, but I understand, toast it's not part of Mexican breakfast. The huevos a la mexicana were bland, no taste whatsoever. The potatoes were really good.The last time we went the service was HORRIBLE!! We waited 20 mins for the waitress to come take our order. The place was not busy at all. When she finally came to our table she did not write our order down, which I've seen the same waitress do before, but our order this time around wasn't just tacos and tortas. I ordered the platter of flautitas, with choice of potato and chicken. My mom ordered the chicken tostadas, she told the waitress that she could not eat cilantro, she assured my mom that there is NO cilantro on the tostadas. Both our orders were wrong. I got beef flautitas and my mom got both tostadas with cilantro, not just sprinkled on top, the chicken was a mixture of cilantro and other veggies. I would think a waitress would know something like this. Besides the wrong orders, we waited 1 HOUR for our food only for it to be wrong! When she took back my food she came back and said they were out of chicken so the cook had decided to substitute without asking! Anyways, if you want great food AND great service, go down the street to TIERRA CALIENTE!!!

50.description: I've have been here twice and have had the ceviche and also the tortas. Both times i have not been disappointed. The ceviche was very wel prepared and although it was a littlen different, it was pretty tasty. The chicken torta was very good and filling as it is filled with all sorts of good stuff. I went in starving not having eaten anything all day and was only able to finish it. And have I mentioned the warm chips and good salsas? They are quite good.I live far from there but would be happy to make the trip there any time!

4.description: Had a great takeout meal from here, included carne asada and al pastor tacos, fresh made chips and guacamole, and the real star of the show, the fire roasted salsa. Make sure to order extra, because it's addictive. The steak and al pastor were well seasoned and tasty. The place itself isn't huge but it had a friendly atmosphere and nice decor. Parking was tricky in the lot for a first-timer, but I managed. Would return again if in the area.

6.description: I am never in this part of town but work took me out there today and oh how glad that it did. As someone currently on a 3 year Mexican tour, I have had a lot of tacos and Mexican food and this place is a winner. I got 3 tacos. A pablano pepper, a pork with pineapple, And a steak taco. All 3 were very very good especially, surprisingly, the pablano taco. I wish I ate there (instead of my car) because I might had been theories to try another. A couple great things about this was i got 3 regular tacos and it was fulfilling and a good price. But they also have mini tacos in case you wanted to try a bunch which I'm regretting not doing. They also gave me two of each sauces and two little bags of hot carrots. What a country. I have one small complaint. They wrapped my steak and pork taco in the same foil although partially separated by a paper. I much rather different tacos foiled separately. Like I said, not a huge deal. Also, the people behind the counter were very nice and the place was packed for 230 in the afternoon. I'm going back soon.

22.description: Have only ever gone here for the carne en su jugo and its great! Personally i think its better than the one at los gallos which chicago's best voted number 1

15.description: Last time I will order from too Luis. I used to like it and recommended to everyone but after giving them a second chance and the restaurant messing up my order I don't think I will want to continue spending my money here. First time they messed up my whole order I usually order over the phone and asked for a veggie torta extra avocado and beans when I got home I did not get any beans or avocado and I actually pay for the extra then my seafood dinner had no cheese or shrimp only fish when the platter I order comes with cheese and shrimps. The second time I order from them the same thing with my torta and the fries really? You will think they won't messed that up but they did. It looked like it was just whatever was left on the frying pan. Horrible! I called and told the girl over the phone and she said well we really can't do anything about it you pay already you should of checked here? Seriously? If I order over the phone it's for a reason. Guys next time go to los gallos better food and better service the only bad part is that they only take cash but it's worth it. The cook from tio Luis sucks!

57.description: The food here is to die for! It might just be as good as grandma's, and trust me, no one tops grandma's cooking! The service is good. Only bad thing I can say about this place is that they don't really play music, and when they do it's creepy religious music. Other than that, this place is great!

20.description: Nice staff sometimes very busy and waiting to be seated is typical on the weekends. Food tastes ok

36.description: Don't like their food! I have tried it a sufficient amount of times and every time I have tried it I have managed to get sick.

14.description: Excellent service....Great food!!!...A must try....I had the Soup it was delicious ....My wife had the seafood and that was amazing...

1.description: About 2 years ago I went to Mary after someone I had trusted my hair to for 3 years practically destroyed my hair with a perm and a color . I was determined to cut it all off but she convinced me not to . She cut my hair and explained  what products to use on my hair to restore it . And now after 1 year my hair feels and looks great . Now she's the only one I trust my locks to .

0.description: Mari is great! Expert coloring and cuts! I have dry, curly hair and she makes me look fabulous every time.

58.description: This place is great. Their crust is different from everywhere else that I have had. Their pasta's and regular food are good too. My favorite is the sauce. It is so fresh and sweet. Some people may think it is too sweet but I find it to be perfect. I used to order a regular thin crust but one day I ordered the deep dish and I was blown away by it. It had the perfect amount of crust, cheese, sauce and ingredients. It's unbelievable! I have taken people here from out of town and they still ask about it. If you want good Chicago pizza, Falco's will satisfy your crave. They deliver but the only bad thing is it is always a minimum of one hour. It is worth it though. I highly recommend it.

56.description: What is it about this pizza?  So darn delicious! I ate inside once. I prefer pickup or delivery.

29.description: Falco's is by far my favorite pizza place in Chicago, but their delivery wait is the worst. Last Friday, it took them an hour and 45 minutes! The pizza wasn't only cold, it wasn't what I ordered. But because I love their pizza so much, I told them I'd wait for another pie. I ordered my pizza at 7:23 and didn't get it finally until 10 pm. They had the nerve to ask me to return the incorrect pizza! Rude. Seeing that my family and I have been ordering from there for years, they could've done a better job at making up for their mistakes. Their customer service could be a little better, but other than that, I don't have other complaints.

42.description: I've been back multiple times and think their pizza is ok. I think they do have a pretty good steak sandwich. Sometimes the onion rings are good too!Cheap beers and laid back atmosphere. Can get crowded at times. Service can be a bit slow, but they are usually nice.

23.description: Pizza, wings, and fries were all delicious, but the dine-in experience was sub-par. Not too many people dine-in, and I understand why. When we walked in it was more of a family owned hang out spot.The free parking is nice, but I will say one one more time: DO NOT DINE IN

47.description: I have only dined here once but I get take-out from here quite often. It is always pizza, pizza, pizza.. I once had a Falco's salad in a vain attempt to try to be healthy and it was pretty damn good but it still wasn't a pizza. If you go anywhere in Chicago you are bound to find a place for pizza. The options in this great city are numerous. There are many winners out there and there are unfortunately many losers also. I had to think good and hard before I wrote this review in order to validate the statement that I am about to make: Falco's pizza has my favorite thin crust pizza in Chicago! That is a rather bold statement with the stiff competition that it faces.Why is this my favorite thin-crust pizza you are asking? They use high quality ingredients and they load each pizza up with them. There has never been a skimpy pizza since I have been eating here. The crust is a good thickness. It supports the loaded toppings perfectly without being too thick and doughy. The sauce is just the way I like it with just a slight sweetness to it. This kind of pizza might not be everyone's bag but it EXACTLY the way I like it.

8.description: Called them for delivery of large pizza; was told it would be delivered in aprox 1 hour. Waited 3 hours, still no sign of the pizza. Called them again only to be told they didn't receive my order. This, by the way, is the 3rd time I had this occur when ordering pizza from them. Never again!

31.description: I still keep coming here as the food is allways great. The service though has been getting worse and worse.   The owner needs to stop hiring the local crack heads.

34.description: This is one of my favorite pizza, when I order take out or delivery. My review is solely based on my DINE IN experience. My husband and I took our little cousins and my little sister to the movies. We all agreed on eating pizza, before dropping them off. We figured we would stop at Falco's, since it is a favorite of ours. Plus, we were hoping to catch the second half of the Bears game; which we did.  Let me make it clear, this was my first time dining in! We walked in and sat down in a booth. Behind us was this loud mouth guy. But hey, he's there having lunch too, right? I thought I was going to have to tell the cook my order and get my drinks because for a few minutes, we didn't have a server. The server finally decides to show up and literally just stares at us. I finally ask, "are you taking our order for drinks?" She replies, "sure." Takes our drink orders and just stands there. Whatever. We are asking the girls if the want appetizers and what they want on their pizza. Meanwhile, this chick (GHETT-O by the way) is still JUST standing there! We put in our order for the appetizers. 5 minutes go by and no drinks. Instead, she is chit chatting with the loud mouth guy that is sitting behind us. My husband tells me not to tell her anything, to just wait. So we waited... and waited... and waited... She finally comes back with our appetizers. No drinks! I ask for our drinks. She says, "oh yeah." O_o Almost 30 minutes later and we still haven't put in our pizza order. She FINALLY brings the drinks. A group of young kids sit next to us on a table. No problem. Another group of teenagers come in and sit on the tall tables behind us... They start cussing and yelling back and forth (they knew each other). Not one manager in sight! 40 minutes have passed. The girls want a refill, the hubby is still hungry, and he also wants a refill. I'm just annoyed at the yelling. The server is coming with a pizza! Yaay!!!! Wait, it's not for us?! These kids got here waaaay after we did (ordered there) and they already have their pizza? We got our pizza an hour later. She gave the girls and the hubby a refill. Never came back to check if we wanted something else; which we did. I never got my water. HORRIBLE service is an understatement.I almost forgot to mention. There were some workers that were cussing at each other and just talking nasty in Spanish. They should be more mindful of their customers. I will never dine in again. I love their pizza, but their customer service and atmosphere is not family friendly.

16.description: Best pizza on planet earth. THE END!

13.description: Good spot! Might watch the games here. Bad thing parking on the st. Hard to find parking

11.description: The competition in the Chicago Pizza biz is stiff.  I've been working somewhat nearby so I thought I'd order some takeout pizza for some coworkers.  I ordered a pepperoni and sausage pizza.  It took less time to finish than what was quoted.  The restaurant itself is a tiny little hole in the wall.  Nothing fancy here, I would not ever dine in.  A couple of tables in a run down looking place.  The kitchen did appear clean to me and there were decent reviews from locals on Yelp. The pizza was pretty tasty, everyone seemed to enjoy it.  The crust was buttery and crisp, the cheese was melty, and the toppings were a meaty salty deliciousness.  I would order it again but I hate visiting the location so I'll just have to send someone else to pick it up.

39.description: This was our primary take out Pizza for the longest time.  Haven't tried it in a long while and there's no real compelling reason to go back.  The pizza (that's what they're famous for) is merely OK at best, it's nothing special.Thin crust has a decent height to it with rolled up edges.  But that along with the sauce is just OK.  Veggie fixins were plenty along with the cheese (pepperoni was sadly missing in quantity and punch).  Keep it hot becuase when it gets cold, it shows it's true colors for how bland it can really be.

37.description: Great pizza! Horrible atmosphere!!!! My boyfriend And I decided to dine in with our 2 year old son. We were told we can sit where ever we wanted. It took the girl 15 minutes to come take our order. We noticed that we we're surround by  "gangbangers" it was so uncomfortable to be there, we decided to take our food to go!! Falco's is definitely not a family place!!! One word to describe it GHETTO!!!

0.description: I tried this pizza for the first time, and this had a good impression for my first. The service was good. The staff were friendly to me when I came. They also were quick on the food.The pizza was great. I had the cheese pizza, and the taste was good. I also tried the fries here. They were thick, but quite tasty!All in all, good pizza place! I'll come back soon!

38.description: I've been a Brighton Park resident for many many years, thus carried out from Falco's many many times. Recently I decide to take the fam out for some dine-in pizza at good old Falco's, specially after a new face lift to the building, but after experiencing the ghettoness that this establishment has become, I prob never order from there again. Couldn't believe how many gangbangers were inside lounging and not even eating, yelling at each other from one side of the building to the next. Cursing, regardless of kids in the place. When I went to the bathroom to take care of  business, a couple of them banggers were selling drugs to each other. A couple of them reeked of weed.  Service was terrible, took 20 min to have someone come over and greet us. It didn't take a minute longer for me to walk out. The people that dine at this place know the Zoo that it has become. I wont spend a single dollar knowing what type of environment this place supports. Ghettoness, drunkenness, gang banging. No managers in site. Everyone basically does what the hell they want here.

51.description: Ok, we read the reviews and were told that the pizza is amazing.  It is amazing, however, I wasn't overwhelmed with the crust as others have written, just the flavor of our everything pizza.  In my travels I have only seen a few pizza places who take the time to add cheese on top over the toppings to seal in the juices, and this is one.  Let me preface this by saying I have never worked at a pizza place and don't know much about it.If I had to dissect the pizza I would say the spinach was marinated in something that gave it the equivalent taste of Indian Saag.  It was delicious but a bit salty.We were in a rush so I took the pizza back to the rental car place and let them eat the rest that I couldn't finish.

27.description: Their spinich on pizza has like and old taste and dark color looking too. I love spinich on pizza and I have tried it again with spinich and no more it's just their way of spinich, I thought maybe that first time was like an acident with old spinich but I guess it's their style or something. I say yuck to that but try their BLT sandwich and if you like bacon it is loaded and good. I have not tried anything els. Not sure if it's a place to go but I will try it one more time with pizza except no spinich lol, we'll see.

32.description: I must start out by saying, if I could I would give it zero stars. The manager looks that of an old gang Banger with tattoos on her hands and all over her body. I swear I thought she was a homeless drug addict, probably just an old retired gang Banger. Way to go! my fiance and I decided to order Falco's for delivery. Not only did it take about 2 hours for the pizza get to us but the delivery boy looked high on drugs, not to mention when we get inside the house one if the pizzas was totally smashed. Pizza delivery boy has one thing to do, deliver a pizza the way he'd want it delivered. Ok there's that. Shortly after we phone the manager, she comes out sounding like a man and his extremely rude. We we had a big order so one of two pizzas was smashed, we returned it. Without her authorization she charged our credit card 2 times, for 2 pizzas and never got the new one. We then went down there and she got in confrontational and in gang Banger mode b/c that's the only way she knows how to talk when someone is unhappy with their food, She was disrespectful and rude to us. She said that's how the owner wants it. That is extremely sad to find out, that this is the way the owner wants to run his ship. With rude employees off the street trying to rehab themselves. I'm all for second chances in life,when you have employees that are trying to what looks like they are reformed drug addicts and gang memebers rehabilitating, you must be polite to the customer, the customer is always right! considering i would go often to get a slice and some fries, have family aprties and have big orders, i haven't been back since and I WILL NEVER GO BACK! The thing is that we live in Chicago and there a million pizzerias around. They are dime a dozen. DO NOT ORDER from them, and don't dare to dine in! read other review for yourself, the place is run by garbage.  Buyer beware.

54.description: Delicious pizza!!their sauce isn't real thick or chunky like others.  Fast delivery and they are generous with their toppings, so much that i take some off at times!!!

48.description: I have ordered pizza from Falco's before and the pizza is delicious. The first time that we decided to try out the bar with a friend. The bartender lady was very friendly and told us to come back. We had ordered a pizza and so we waited while we drank a pitcher of beer, ate an appetizer and watched television in the bar. We left within an hour. Well we decided to go back in two weeks. I just came back from there and I am telling you that I will not go back. We had ordered the pitcher of beer and also an appetizer and within an hour we are presented with the check which neither of us asked for. As soon as we pay her she says good bye girls basically kicking us out. Let me tell you that I feel confused because we were not rowdy or anything like that. It was just me and my friend drinking a beer. I am definitely not going back there and would not recommend it. If you are a stranger they do not take to kindly to you.

44.description: I have been eating Falco's pizza for the better part of my existence, and I'm okay with that.  I recently rediscovered Falcos after determining they deliver to my house, and that I could get my perfect proportions of cheese, sauce and crust without leaving my home.  We have ordered pan from them twice, and delivery is about an hour - however I cannot compare this to a thin-crust order.  -1 star for my pizza coming and falling apart last night.

24.description: The competition in the Chicago Pizza biz is stiff.  I've been working somewhat nearby so I thought I'd order some takeout pizza for some coworkers.  I ordered a pepperoni and sausage pizza.  It took less time to finish than what was quoted.  The restaurant itself is a tiny little hole in the wall.  Nothing fancy here, I would not ever dine in.  A couple of tables in a run down looking place.  The kitchen did appear clean to me and there were decent reviews from locals on Yelp. The pizza was pretty tasty, everyone seemed to enjoy it.  The crust was buttery and crisp, the cheese was melty, and the toppings were a meaty salty deliciousness.  I would order it again but I hate visiting the location so I'll just have to send someone else to pick it up.

7.description: Pick up area is the worst. 10-year old works the counter area. Wait is forever. Service sucks. Please close down immediately !!!

49.description: Of all the pizzas I've ever tasted...this has to be the most saltiest...my instant thought was...does the cook have taste buds?lol...and it was kinda soggy from the middle...I use to order form them a long time ago...and back then it was pretty good...so what happend?hmmm very dissapointed....

40.description: Quite possibly the worst pizza I've ever had in my life. Have had Falco's from the Cicero location my whole life and it has been wonderful. This location is so terrible it's almost funny. Pizza was half cooked, canned mushrooms, little to no sauce and the sausage was non-existent. And we waited appx. 80 minutes. You couldn't design a worse pizza if you intended to. Please, go out and shoot a squirrel in front of your house and eat that instead, you'll be quite happy you did. This pizza was so bad I'm actually angry with Yelp for forcing me to give a minimum of one star.

53.description: Definitely a good pizza place for people who like pizza.  Their crust is just perfect and they are never shy with the toppings which is absolutely awesome. Their sides are very good as well but I make it a habit to never fill up with appetizers because the pizza is definitely EXCELLENT! I've been a fan for years and will continue to be a fan for years to come.

30.description: I've been a falcos fan all of my life. Great pizza. The biggest problem that I have recently encountered is that when ordering over the phone using my credit card they wanted my zip code, my full name and the three numbers on the back of my card. Since when do pizza places ask for that? Sounds super suspect. Be Careful.

46.description: They say you always love your first and they are so right! Falco's was the pizza of choice growing up on the rare occasion my parents ordered in. A couple of decades later, now that I order my own pizzas, if I am on the south-side, Falco's is my pizza of choice.Their thin crust is spot on. The sauce isn't weak and the cheese and ingredients are Plentiful!I've never had an issue calling my orders in - but they have Online Ordering for people who don't want to talk to people!!Great Pizza AND Online Ordering! Really, what more can a person ask for?!

1.description: My co-worker said this place has the best calzone's in Chicago so he brought me one. My Lord this thing was huge! I ate it in quarters took me 3 days to finish. I would like to try it fresh out the oven next time but I'll need help eating it lol

55.description: Order for Lunch. More than 1.5 hrs. Pizza is ice cold. Called and was told to microwave it. CLASSY.

9.description: Best pizza ever!!! It's delish! Small pieces just the perfect tasting sauce. It's so good!!! I feel like it's a bit pricey but so worth it!

26.description: Good pizza. Most horrible service in the world. I understand it's the hood but if you have to stand for 20 fukin minutes in the pick up area without anyone asking what you want because they're fuking around in the kitchen, it makes for bad business.  2nd time i walk out without a slice

25.description: First off, the dining experience. Do not dine here!!! The place is crawling with drunks and ghetto looking people! Me and my gf had to pass by a group of gangbangers and once in the dining room was greeted by another group of drunks all sitting in the bar shouting about something. It smelled like smoke and smelly people. The waitress ignored us, she was busy serving and talking to the old drunks. We ended up leaving instead and went next door to order carry out.Now the food. This is the only reason I gave it 2 stars. The panzarotti with sausage and pepperoni was delicious. It was crispy cheesy and packed with flavor. We also ordered a thin pizza with the garlic italiano crust and it was very good. Just a hint of garlic and crispy. It took 40 min to be ready but we waited there in the pickup room away from the noisy ghetto people. All in all, if you come here,based on our dining experience, just go for take out or delivery.

12.description: Decent pizza, but not the best like everyone claims. Very greasy. Very processed tasting. Too much dough. Could benefit from fresh ingredients.

59.description: Great pizza.  Travel a wide section of the city for work and keep coming back to this place.  Excellent thin crust, tasty sauce, and they load up the cheese and sausage.  I usually get a slice, which is more then enough to fill me up.  Counter staff on the take out side can be rude at times depending on who you get.  I don't let that deter me from this tasty pizza.

21.description: Ive always likes this pizza. Its heavy on the salt at times but the ingredients are good. You can tell the dough is made fresh and doesnt come from a warehouse. The sausage is good quality. Thats the difference between this pizza and most other cheap places that use poor quality ingredients.

17.description: Pizza, wings, and fries were all delicious, but the dine-in experience was sub-par. Not too many people dine-in, and I understand why. When we walked in it was more of a family owned hang out spot.The free parking is nice, but I will say one one more time: DO NOT DINE IN

10.description: It's probably been 20+ years since I've been here and the pizza is still good!!  Good service and good drinks. I'll be a regular again!!

5.description: Yesterday my family and I ordered a 16 inch half sausage half pepperoni, extra sauce and well done pizza along with a 12 piece hot chicken wing which came with fries. Since the order was over 30 bucks (before taxes) we got a free 6 pack of soda. The total was 37.50. Great service the pizza got here in about 45 minutes and was nice and hot! My family eats home runn in pizza allot and the story is that falcos and home runn in were co owners at one point and then separated. We could taste the similarity in both pizzas. Great pizza

3.description: I've been ordering from here for about a year cuz the pizza is decent, but it always takes crazy long for delivery. Tonight I was told it would take an hour and ten minutes (on a boring Tuesday night). One hour 45 min later I called asking where it was. The girl said it was on the way. Another forty five minutes later I call and find out she had the wrong phone number in the first place. Not that the driver needed it cuz I gave directions to the intercom and said to dial my name. Manager told me it would take another 45 min to deliver (3+hours now) and offered me a 10$ credit on a future order. That's not even half off a small pizza. I know it's just a hole in the wall pizza delivery place, but horrible customer service. Never use em again.

35.description: The original pizza joint we all hit up as kids! It still delivers!  I make it a point to go for a slice every now and then!

19.description: Well I decided to come by with the partner because the experience we had recently was awesome.  We have been wanting a GINORMOUS burger lately, but no one has them readily available. So we choose Hot Wings this time with a pitcher (Mind you, the pitcher is a little bit more then the weekends, which I found kind of backward but did not complain). Any-who, decided to just ask the waitress about the burgers, she stated "Oh does your jaw unhinge?" I was like, is this a pretext to whats to come? I was flabbergasted at the size of the two orders of double hamburgers the partner and I ordered. Are you freakin' serious? These things are HUGE! The waitress did not lie and she so deserved that $10 tip! I was really like, oh no I can't eat this. So I split off the burger and had some to take home. As usual the hot wings were perfect and the fries that come with it balanced out the fact that the burgers do not come with fries, but that was okay since we had beer, burgers, and hot wings. I was really happy I came on a Tuesday and I was surprised at the fact that they serve all you can eat pizza slices from 11:30 until 2:30 I believe. Considering they have a high school across the street, I bet that it really gets crowded come early lunch time. Again, I doubled up on the review because FINALLY, Chicago's South Side has a burger worth mentioning. At under $5, oh yes Falco's, you've made a believer out of me once again, I am in heaven!

28.description: Great neighborhood pizza place!! The pizza is good, the staff is great and they give good deals to our school for pizza parties!! If your in the neighborhoodcstop on through and get a slice!!

45.description: SO UPSET!im a veggie lover, and a few friends of mine like them, but not as much as i do.so we agreed on JUST spinach and pepperoni. when the pizza arrives its filled with ONIONS and spinach, very little pepperoni.so i called them, spoke to the MANAGER and he told me thats how they make the spinach. they make it with onion! ARE YOU KIDDING ME!it was more onion than spinach. he told me they cant do anything and hung up on me!very upset. horrible! lost a customer for ever!

33.description: ***DO NOT DINE IN!*** poor customer service is an understatment!! Not family friendly!!! You will wait and wait and wait for your food, you will be lucky to get a refill on your drinks unless you get up yourself and walk over to the bar and ask for it yourself.  I'm not writing this review on one experience, yes! I was foolish enough to actually dine in a few times thinking that maybe the previous time was just a bad day. I was wrong! It was a horrible experience each time. Pizza is good but I would avoid this place at all cost, unless you don't care about customer service! You've been warned!!!!

43.description: Called for a late delivery and was cheerfully answered. Had a few questions about items on menu and was patiently answered. Placed order and girl gave is free delivery not sure y but that was cool. I ordered ckn Alfredo and the Mr. Had panzaratti. Took about 30 mins food was good.

2.description: Have had falcos pizza a dozen times. It has great crust but there is a ton of salt in it. The last pizza made me and my two friends sick.  Won't order again. Also our "well done" pizza was undercooked in the middle.

18.description: The pizza here is delicious. The amount of ingredients put on the pizza is always satisfying. However the service they have on the staff answering the phone is horrible. Everytime I call to order a pizza I am put on hold. Every single time i have ordered for delivery it has taken double the time then promised on the phone. When I call to inquire about the pizza they rudely tell me they are busy or short staffed and it'll be there soon. I understand if they are busy. But I want a realistic time of delivery. The rudeness is also not  necessary. If it wasn't for how good the pizza is I would give a one star.

41.description: Well I decided to come by with the partner because the experience we had recently was awesome.  We have been wanting a GINORMOUS burger lately, but no one has them readily available. So we choose Hot Wings this time with a pitcher (Mind you, the pitcher is a little bit more then the weekends, which I found kind of backward but did not complain). Any-who, decided to just ask the waitress about the burgers, she stated "Oh does your jaw unhinge?" I was like, is this a pretext to whats to come? I was flabbergasted at the size of the two orders of double hamburgers the partner and I ordered. Are you freakin' serious? These things are HUGE! The waitress did not lie and she so deserved that $10 tip! I was really like, oh no I can't eat this. So I split off the burger and had some to take home. As usual the hot wings were perfect and the fries that come with it balanced out the fact that the burgers do not come with fries, but that was okay since we had beer, burgers, and hot wings. I was really happy I came on a Tuesday and I was surprised at the fact that they serve all you can eat pizza slices from 11:30 until 2:30 I believe. Considering they have a high school across the street, I bet that it really gets crowded come early lunch time. Again, I doubled up on the review because FINALLY, Chicago's South Side has a burger worth mentioning. At under $5, oh yes Falco's, you've made a believer out of me once again, I am in heaven!

52.description: OH MY GOSH !!!! OH MY GOSH !!!! This IS by far the BEST PIZZA I have ever eaten.....REALLY !! I have been coming here for years as a kid and rediscovered it as an adult and am HOOKED !!!! I order the traditional cheese & sausage and agree with Marcos R...don't know what they put in this pizza but it is SOOOOOOO GOOD !! I eat healthy but have to get my fix of Falco's every now and then. I LOVE IT & AM SO ADDICTED!!!!

50.description: I love me some falcos. But The lady who sounds like a man who always by the way answers the phone is the most rudest lady! please fire her and hire someone who is actually professional and not rude. I was telling her my order and the dumb broad was trying to rush me. um seriously! i could have smacked her thru the phone. sadly this place will have me ordering from this place much anymore. food is good YES, but we also like to be treated with some respect, regardless if you all are busy!!.the lady  is what brought down my stars and the reason why i refuse to continue to order from here.

4.description: This pizza is pretty good. Lately it's been hard to find good pizza but this place gets my vote.

6.description: when it's a Monday night and Chop Suey City is closed go here. Or if its game day and yr into that kind of thing. Get pizza with garlic crust, v good and garlicy. Reasonable price for pitcher of headache (beer). Server was slightly confused when we only ordered onions, but very nice and friendly. They also have a pool table, not sure if its working. Would order for delivery as well. Thats when I'll give a real review.

22.description: Great pizza...cheap beer what more can you for froma neighborhood pizza joint? One of the best in Chicago I might add.

15.description: Pretty decent neighborhood pizzeria. Prices decent, but I can tell they use mediocre cheese and toppings. They do have a decent double dough crust. Overall value considering the quality is still fairly high.

57.description: Ok, I promote myself as being a critical person.   I like Panda Express but I am still suspicious. I used to love White Castle and am still suspicious.  I can't stop ordering the pizza I order from Falcos but I am still suspicious...Whoa Whoa Whoa!!!...Don't get me wrong my suspicion is dissimilar to that of my Panda and White castle suspicion.  I think everything is legit at Falco's, what I am suspicious of is whether or not their is crack or beer in the pizza.  There has to be some reason I am so addicted.  I have friends travel from St. Louis and Wisconsin to eat the pizza.  They claim its to visit me but I know the real truth.  I have also got my office hooked on it.  Its just *sigh* good.  I feel like singing "hey Mr. Falco, tell me where have you been...we been asking, we been wondering why" If you order tell them I sent you--you won't get a discount but they'll know me that's how hooked I am.This is what I have ordered from Falco's:thin crust and deep dishSausageMushroomJalapenosBacon*I know to some Jalapenos sounds spicy and harsh but if you ask for light jalapenos you will get a flavor not so much a spicy kickEnjoy

20.description: Pizza was good.  Lots of cheese and toppings that I ordered.  The problem was that the pizza (2 of them) stuck to the bottoms of the cardboard delivery boxes.  I like a whole piece of pizza, not just the topping.  It really ruined the experience.  I have friends who swear by this place.  A friend of mine said they forgot to sprinkle the bottom of the box with cornmeal so it wouldn't stick.  I don't know if that's what they do to prevent it from sticking, but they definitely forgot something.

36.description: I have been to this place maybe 3 times. The first time I went I didn't think anything of it because it was a big order for a party so I was not paying close attention to anything else but the second time I went I was a "walk in" grabbing a couple of slices for my husband and I on his lunch. They were rude. The woman that's always at the counter takes forever to come to the counter even though the door has a bell when it opens. She says what do you need instead of hello can I help you like a normal person working in the business of needing customers! For the third time is basically the one that broke the camels back and made me resort to Facebook, better business bureau and yelp! I'm not a complainer but geez these people don't even try to be hospitable on the phone or in their business. My friends were over and called and the women who answered was so rude they forgot an item on our order when I called she was like come pick it up then then she passed the phone to someone else and said deal with this lady.
